lines: You've made it to Level 3! This is the most dangerous area yet.
The enemies here are numerous and aggressive - be extremely careful.
This level is infested with Stakor creatures. They're fast but have less health.
Find the terminal with code 9999 to unlock the main door.
Once you've defeated all enemies, the exit will be revealed.
This is the final test of your skills. Good luck, and may you survive!
